title: Dönence
overview: Gece, who is planning to go to university, also dreams of making music with her boyfriend Emir all summer long. But all her dreams have to be put on hold for a while. Because for her sister Gülce, who is a special child, the crowd and noise of Istanbul has become more and more difficult to cope with. Gece, who does not want to leave her boyfriend and all her dreams in Istanbul, suddenly finds herself in Foça with her family. Gece, whose life is turned upside down, meets Özgür, who is an instructor at the sailing club where his brother was enrolled. Özgür is a handsome young man who devoted his life to his brother Rüzgar, who has Asperger's syndrome, after losing his parents in a fire. As Gece meets Özgür, she will learn to look at life from a more mature perspective, and Özgür will learn from Gece not to put life on hold. However, in this process, with the arrival of Gece's boyfriend Emir in Foça, difficult walls are formed between the two. Will Gece dare to go after true love?
